'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The dwarf server of the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) officer lounge, he has seen more than his fair share of arguments and unwise betting over the games of hazatōha made by the sailors. He hails from a small village near Tākowa and joined up because, well, the ranga nui always pays on time.
